summary: Dame Maggie Smith was a famous British actress who worked in theater, TV, and movies. She started acting in the 1950s and became well-known for her roles in plays by Shakespeare and other writers. She won an Academy Award for her parts in "The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie" (1969) and "California Suite" (1978). Smith was also loved for her roles in the "Harry Potter" movies and the TV show "Downton Abbey." She won many awards and was very successful in her long career.
title: List of Maggie Smith performances
